news_header: High bankruptcy applications in early 2024, with 128 in one week, marking a decade peak.
news_original_title: Vuoden alussa tehty poikkeuksellisen paljon konkurssihakemuksia
news_text: An exceptional number of bankruptcy applications have been filed in early 2024, with 128 enterprises filing in one week, the highest in the 2020s. A total of 3006 bankruptcies were declared in Finland in 2024, the largest number in the 2000s, primarily affecting small firms.
